liquibase.database.template.ArgTypePreparedStatementSetter

liquibase.database.template.ArgTypePreparedStatementSetter Class Reference

Inheritance diagram for liquibase.database.template.ArgTypePreparedStatementSetter:
[legend]

List of all members.

Detailed Description

Simple adapter for PreparedStatementSetter that applies given arrays of arguments and JDBC argument types.

Author:
Spring Framework

Definition at line 16 of file ArgTypePreparedStatementSetter.java.
